webTitle: Taksim square: riot police evict protesters in Istanbul - video

fields.standfirst: Riot police storm Istanbul's Taksim square to evict hundreds of anti-government protesters, just hours after an ultimatum from prime minister Tayyip Erdogan. Police fire tear gas and water cannons to disperse the crowd. Security forces also storm the adjoining Gezi park, where protesters had been camping in a ramshackle settlement of tents. Erdogan had issued a warning to demonstrators following more than two weeks of fierce anti-government protests

webTitle: Iran: Hassan Rouhani's supporters celebrate presidential victory - video

fields.standfirst: Hassan Rouhani's supporters celebrate his presidential victory on the streets of Tehran on Saturday. Supporters gather in downtown Tehran after the Iranian interior ministry announced Rouhani's landslide victory. Rouhani's nearest rival was the mayor of Tehran, Mohammed Bagher Ghalibaf, with less than 16 percent of the vote. Rouhani rose to international prominence as Iran's nuclear negotiator. He left the post when Mahmoud Ahmadinejad came to office in 2005
